solve_chains.step_response:
## S2: Analysis of the Color of the Unique Line in Figure 5

In figure 5, the line that has no intersection with any other line is confirmed to be colored green. This conclusion is drawn from a thorough examination of the figure, which distinctly highlights the unique line that remains separate from all others. The identification of this line is crucial as it illustrates a specific characteristic of the diagram, emphasizing its isolation from the other lines present.

To summarize, the color of the line that does not intersect with any other line in figure 5 is green.
